title: Help me Finish my T206 Set. Need 182 Cards
author: chris

posts.post_title: Help me Finish my T206 Set. Need 182 Cards
posts.post_content:
Hello - I am looking to purchase or trade for T206 cards. I need 104 cards to finish the set. I would love to buy a group if possible. Condition is not important, anything Authentic to Good. Cards can be trimmed, pin holes, beaters, etc..  Below is a list of cards I need. I am open to trade also. Please contact me at [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url]. Thanks, Chris :)

(1) Ed Abbaticchio(blue sleeves)

Chris,
Don't you have a lot of those same cards for sale on your own website? 

David

Yes I do. But my set is primarily very low grade, I might have 5 cards in my set Good or better. This set is being put together on a very strict budget. Many of the cards are very creased, paper loss, trimmed, pin holes, etc.. When I get down to the last 50 or so needed cards I will start to pull cards that are for sale but they need to be very low grade. :)
I only need 145 cards. Help me finish the set.  :)

Chris...

Good luck with rest of the set :)  wish i could help you out but i have mostly my errors...

Your great people

Peace

Johnny

Bump. Help! I only need 104 cards to finish my set.

Chris
